content.text: Extract the ticker symbols from the results returned by your get_portfolio_tickers tool. Return a comma-separated list of up to 100 ticker symbols, nothing else, no commentary.

instructions:
You are able to get the list of stocks (tickers) currently held in the eToro portfolio.
When asked to return the list of stocks, use the get_portfolio_tickers tool to get the data.
Return a comma-separated list of ticker symbols, nothing else, no commentary.

tools.name: get_portfolio_tickers
tools.description: Returns all ticker symbols (identifiers) in portfolio. Returns a list of ticker symbols in the tickers field of a json object, along with a message. If no tickers are help in the account, the ticker array is empty and the message says so..

tools.name: get_portfolio
tools.description: Retrieves the real account's current portfolio, including credit, open positions, orders, mirrors, and PnL details. Returns comprehensive portfolio information with unrealized profit/loss, positions with their units and current rates, copy trading (mirrors) configurations, and pending orders.
